title: Correct team member name spelling (Bennita → Benitta)

requirements.text: Update the Team section to display the team member name as “Benitta” (not “Bennita”).
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/site/sections/TeamSection.tsx`, the team member currently rendered as “Bennita” is changed to “Benitta”.
The Team section UI renders “Benitta” everywhere the member name is displayed.
No other team member names, roles, or bios are changed.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend single-actor architecture unchanged; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing any team roles, bios, ordering, or the number of team members.
Updating the contact form or any backend canister logic.
Changing the site theme, layout, or other section copy.
